description: Mocked GRACE/GRACE-FO inspired mass balance record for the West Antarctic Ice Sheet used to exercise V3 adapters before live credentials are issued.

control_parameter_R.description: Near-shelf ocean temperature anomaly influencing basal melt.

response_sigma.description: Normalised distance of the logistic membrane to the collapse threshold.

threshold_estimates.zeta_R: ζ(R) couples basal melt feedbacks with ice-shelf buttressing; higher ζ increases collapse impedance.

preprocessing_steps: Synthetically generate monthly mass balance and meltwater flux trajectories (2002-01 to 2024-10)
Inject variance and AR(1) drift to mimic critical slowing

sources.name: Armstrong-McKay et al. (2022)
sources.citation: Exceeding 1.5°C global warming could trigger multiple climate tipping points

falsification_notes: Guard rail: retain ΔAIC ≥ 25 over linear/power-law nulls once live data replace the mock sequence.
